text: negative results from Clinical quality
measures can lead to various
consequences for providers Healthcare
organizations can receive lower
reimbursement rates and even penalties
when participating in the merit-based
incentive payment system known as mips
while clinicians need to better
understand the factors affecting
individual clinical quality measures
staying informed can be challenging
guidance for quality measures is
frequently updated and guidelines are
stored in unstructured PDFs on the
centers for Medicare and Medicaid
services website clinicians can spend
several hours per week tracking quality
measure specifications which detracts
from the time available for delivering
patient care in this first example we'll
demonstrate how a generative AI powered
guide can help clinicians quickly find
information about quality measures we're
using a simple conversational interface
powered by Amazon Q for business here
we're using Diabetes Care quality
measures as an example
clinicians can easily upload a PDF
they've downloaded from the CMS website
to Amazon Q after uploading the
clinician can use the AI guided
interface to ask questions and retrieve
information easily eliminating the need
to read through an entire document they
can also ask the guide to summarize the
methodology that the central agencies
used the clinician can ask follow-up
questions on how different measures were
used to identify patient cohorts based
on standard of care uploading clinical
trial documents to an Amazon S3 bucket
linked to Amazon Q allows clinicians to
discover more ways to enhance the
quality of patient care for example they
can ask if there are ongoing clinical
trials recruiting participants for type
2 diabetes specifically among Latin
populations Amazon Q promptly delivers
pertinent information and guidance
streamlining next steps enhancing
clinical decision-making and supporting
clinicians in improving overall patient
care outcomes
in this second example we explore how
other members of The Care team such as
administrative staff can use an AI
powered guide to track quality measures
the CMS website is full of myips
information that administrators want to
search through and ask questions about
Amazon Kendra Amazon's Enterprise search
engine can automatically read that
information and translate it into a
searchable index with just a few clicks
Amazon Q can use the Kendra index
allowing a administrative staff to ask
questions in plain language about MP's
details in this demo these two Services
work together for easy CMS website
searching administrators can find for
example the 2023 mips categories as well
as factors affecting a provider's final
MIP score all via the Amazon Q
interface these intelligent tools
Empower administrators and physics to
quickly find relevant information that
directly affects myip scores with this
knowledge the they can address various
issues and maximize value-based care
[Music]
reimbursements
